text2:
PER: Paul TherouxMISC: ' s Earliest Travel Memory Is a Train Ride Through New England
Novelist and master of travel writing PER: Paul Theroux, who made his name journeying from the LOC: U. K. to LOC: Japan and back by train for LOC: The Great Railway Bazaar , hit the open road for his latest book. We spoke to him about his most recent trips—and how he's changed as he's traveled the world.

Where have you just returned from?

I've spent three or four months of almost every summer, from 1971 or '72 until the present one, in LOC: Cape Cod , where I am right now, without really moving. Traveling in the summer is no fun, because everyone else is doing it. The weather in LOC: Cape Cod is lovely throughout autumn, so I plant myself there, then travel in the middle of winter or in the spring. I also find that I get a lot of work done in the summer; you can only write if you're in one place for an extended period of time, without interruption.

What is your earliest holiday memory?

Going to visit my aunt and uncle in LOC: Hartford, LOC: Connecticut, when I was seven or eight. My parents put me on the train in LOC: Boston , alone, and I sat by the window. It was early summer, and I just looked out at the tobacco fields. It's a memory of being free and very content. I definitely had the feeling that I wanted to do it again, so that's the origin of my wanderlust, I suppose.

What is the greatest train route on earth?

LOC: Ho Chi Minh City to LOC: Hanoi . It was built after the MISC: Vietnam War ended. You can book a sleeper and continue up to the MISC: Chinese border. It's a really interesting coastal route, with nice people and a sense of forgiveness, which is a very big thing because so much was destroyed in the war.

What made you want to write a book about LOC: Mexico?

When I was working on an earlier book, I went to LOC: Nogales, LOC: Arizona, which is right on the border with LOC: Mexico. I had never seen the 30-foot rusty steel fence that divides the two before. It's a strange, beautiful object, like a sculpture running through the landscape. It had a door in it, and it was fairly straightforward: I parked my car in LOC: Arizona, went through it, and suddenly I was in LOC: Mexico, with MISC: Mexican food, people, beer, tacos. I met migrants who were trying to get into the U.S., people who had been kicked out. Then Trump became president. One of the reasons for travel is to destroy stereotypes, so I thought, I'm going to write about Mexico and see what it is, every bit of it.

How has your love of travel evolved?

When I started traveling I was a self-involved smarty-pants. I thought that a travel book was about the traveler: I like this, I don't like that. At some point I put my ego in check and realized that it isn't about whether you're having a good or bad time; it's about the stories people tell.

Do you have a favorite city?

I find city life nasty, but if I had to choose one, I would say London. You can still live in a house in London; my kids, Louis and Marcel, live in houses there. You can't do that in Manhattan. People in London are friendly, and it's a lovely place to visit.

And a favorite view?

Looking west from Waimea Bay in Hawaii, past the palm trees and the outcrops of lava rock, to the Pacific. There's something about watching the sea that is very calming, and it keeps changing with the light.

A place that most lived up to the hype?

New England in the autumn . It never fails to dazzle me. The trees turn golden. Henry David Thoreau said, 'The leaves teach us how to die,’ so when you see the changing of the season, you think, Well, this is a cycle. It's what is going to happen to us.

How do you relax?

I lie on very hot sand on a beach in Hawaii and fall asleep, with the heat against my back, and snore and drool.

The most interesting person you've met?

A beachcomber, north of Cooktown in Australia. He was originally from England, and he was alone, with a dog and an orderly little camp where he was brewing beer. He was building a raft, which he said he was going to sail around the country. I asked, ‘Do you think you can do it?’ He said, ‘You can go anywhere if you're not in a hurry.’ I don't know whether he made it, but that guy made an impression on me more than any head of state, painter, or writer.

What do you pack first?

It used to be a Swiss Army knife, but you can't travel with them anymore. Something that I always carry with me is a briefcase I've had for many, many years, made by Glaser Designs in San Francisco, which becomes almost like a portable office.

What's your guilty pleasure?

Fish and chips, more than a gourmet meal. One of the great fish-and-chip countries of the world is South Africa.

Where in the world do you feel happiest?

The guilty secret of this world traveler is that I love being at home. I have two: one in Cape Cod and one in Hawaii. When you reach a certain age, you figure out where it is you want to live, what kind of bed you want, what kind of library, what kind of swimming pool, what kind of garden. And then that becomes where you're happiest. But if you're talking about a country, I would say Mexico. I love the food, I find the people amiable—they make wonderful friends once you've earned their respect—and the landscape is everything. It has mountains, beautiful coastline, jungles, forests. And one of the great cities of the world: Mexico City, 22 million people, more than 150 museums. Plus I speak the language. That's an essential.

Anywhere you still want to go?

Well, I've never been to Greenland, Norway, Finland, or Sweden. But I do have a fuck-it list of places I'd never go back to. Anywhere there is a cave, cavern, or underground bunker. Skydiving out of a plane—definitely on the fuck-it list. It's actually a longer list than the bucket list.

Theroux's new book On the Plain of Snakes: A Mexican Road Trip ($30, Houghton Mifflin Harcourt) is out now.

text1: LOC: Israel transferirá el registro de tierras de la ORG: Administración Civil a la ORG: Corte de Justicia – PORG: ##NN Por: ORG: Madeeha Araj/ NBORG: ##PRS/ La ORG: Oficina Nacional para la defensa de la tierra y la ORG: resistencia a los asentamientos afirmó en su último informe semanal, que a solo unos días nos separan de la ORG: Fiscalía de la Corte Penal Internacional Corte – ORG: CPI, MISC: Anuncio de ORG: Fatou Bensouda del fin del examen preliminar de la situación en LOC: Palestina, y aceptación de la jurisdicción de la ORG: CPI sobre los crímenes cometidos por LOC: Israel en los territorios palestinos ocupados. text2: Palestinesi denunciano il ritardo delle indagini del procuratore della ORG: CPI sui crimini di guerra israeliani dalla verità In uno sviluppo significativo per la responsabilità israeliana, PER: Fatou Bensouda, procuratore capo della ORG: Corte penale internazionale (ORG: ICC), cerca di avviare un'indagine sui crimini di guerra commessi in LOC: Palestina. Ma ha stabilito una condizione non necessaria e politicamente sospetta per rallentare il processo. Dopo un esame preliminare di cinque anni, PER: Bensouda ha trovato una base ragionevole per avviare un'indagine sulla "situazione in LOC: Palestina". È "soddisfatta del fatto che (i) siano stati o siano stati commessi crimini di guerra in LOC: Cisgiordania, comprese LOC: Gerusalemme Est e la LOC: Striscia di Gaza ... (ii) potenziali casi derivanti dalla situazione sarebbero ammissibili; e (iii) ci sono nessun motivo sostanziale per ritenere che un'indagine non serva agli interessi della giustizia". PER: Bensouda ha avviato l'esame preliminare sei. La ORG: Corte ha poi respinto la richiesta di PER: Bensouda di avviare le indagini, adducendo "gli interessi della giustizia". Il segretario di Stato PER: Mike Pompeo ha minacciato di intraprendere ulteriori azioni contro gli investigatori che partecipano a un'indagine della ORG: CPI. Pagina successiva 1 |

text1: LOC: Zoo Krefeld: Brand im Affenhaus tötete mehr Tiere als bisher bekannt Fast alle Affen des LOC: Krefelder Zoos starben beim Brand in der Neujahrsnacht. Die Ermittler fanden schnell erste Hinweise auf die Brandursache. Beim Brand im Affenhaus im LOC: Krefelder Zoo starben in der Silvesternacht mehr als 50 Tiere. Am Montag begannen nun die Abrissarbeiten. Affenhaus LOC: Zoo Krefeld: Mehr Tiere bei Brand getötet als bisher bekannt LOC: Krefeld. Bei dem verheerenden Brand im LOC: Krefelder Zoo in der Silvesternacht sind mehr Tiere getötet worden als bisher bekannt. Wie aus einer Vorlage für den Stadtrat hervorgeht, kamen bei dem schweren Feuer mehr als 50 Tiere um. Bisher war von mehr als 30 Tieren die Rede gewesen. Acht Menschenaffen, goldene Löwenäffchen, Silberäffchen, Weißgesichtssakis, Zwergseidenäffchenzoos war in der Nacht auf Neujahr komplett niedergebrannt. Nach den Ermittlungen der Polizei wurde das Feuer von einer sogenannten Himmelslaterne ausgelöst, mit der drei Frauen unwillentlich den Brand ausgelöst hatten. (mbr/dpa
text2: LOC: Krefeld: Zoo öffnet nach dem Brand im Affenhaus wieder Fast alle Affen des LOC: Krefelder Zoos starben beim Brand in der Neujahrsnacht. Die Ermittler fanden schnell erste Hinweise auf die Brandursache. Brandunglück LOC: Krefeld: Zoo öffnet nach dem Brand im Affenhaus wieder LOC: Krefeld. Nachdem das Affenhaus in der Silvesternacht ausgebrannt ist, öffnet der LOC: Zoo Krefeld wieder. Tausend Menschen kamen am Donnerstag zur Trauerfeier. Inhalt ARTIKEL AUF EINER SEITE LESEN > Vorherige Seite Nächste Seite LOC: Krefeld: Zoo öffnet nach dem Brand im Affenhaus wieder Nach dem verheerenden Brand im Affenhaus öffnet der Zoo in LOC: Krefeld am Freitag wieder. In dem traditionsreichen Tierpark waren in der Silvesternacht mehr als 30 Tiere, darunter mehrere Menschenaffen, bei einem Feuer ums Leben gekommen. Das Affenhaus wurde zerstört und ist einsturzgefährdetffenhaus bereits in Vollbrand. text1: This LOC: Minneapolis cocktail bar is helping you do 'MISC: Dry January' If you’re reading this amid a massive MISC: New Year’s hangover, you just might have been MISC: Googling “MISC: Dry January.” Many people make the commitment, for a month, to dry out, so to speak. Just not the star of the show.) PER: Eric Dayton, ORG: Marvel Bar’s co-owner, quit drinking three years ago. ORG: Marvel Bar’s general manager, PER: Peder Schweigert, doesn’ of addiction. “Each person has their reason for doing it,” PER: Dayton said, “and we want to make them feel welcomed.” ORG: Marvel Bar 50 2nd Av. S., Mpls., 612-206-3929, marvelbar.co
text2: 2019 road toll lower but still 'staggering' ORG: Police would continue to focus on the key factors that led to people dying on the road. Photo by PER: Stephen Jaquiery For the first time in six years, there was a reduction in the number of deaths on the road last year. At the end of the year 353 people had died on the roads, a drop of 24 compared to 2018's road toll of 377. Assistant commissioner for road policing, PER: Sandra Venables, said the drop was good news, but the loss of life was still far too high. "It is promising to see after years of death and serious injuries increasing on LOC: New Zealand roads, it is starting to turn around," PER: Venables said. "But this number is still no comfort to the people who have lost loved ones on our roads." Duty Minister PER: Iain Lees - Galloway echoed those thoughts, saying the decrease is positive, but the roads as so many people are still on holiday; travelling around visiting loved ones and making the most of their time off over the summer. "We want all road users to do this safely, and not end up in hospital, or worse, the mortuary.

text1: Autista di camion accusato di DWI dopo aver colpito a morte un pedone alla vigilia di MISC: Capodanno Martedì un camionista è stato arrestato per aver colpito a morte un pedone a LOC: East Harlem. Un portavoce della polizia ha detto che l'incidente è avvenuto intorno alle 17:00. la vigilia di MISC: Capodanno all'incrocio tra LOC: E. 125 Street e LOC: Madison Avenue. Un autista di un camion ORG: SafeMISC: ##lite, identificato come PER: Farkell Hopkins, stava guidando in direzione est sulla LOC: 125th Street quando ha colpito il pedone, che stava tentando di attraversare la strada a metà isolato. PER: Farkell, che è rimasto sulla scena, è stato accusato di omicidio stradale e guida in stato di ebbrezza. Il ORG: Daily News ha notato che la vittima, ritenuta sulla quarantina, non aveva un documento d'identità e la polizia sta ancora lavorando per identificarlo. Statistiche del ORG: Dipartimento dei trasporti a partire da lunedì scorso anche a lunedì, da 115 in tutto il 2018. Ventinove ciclisti sono morti, quasi il triplo delle vittime dell'anno scorso. Abbiamo contattato il DOT per ottenere il conteggio finale delle vittime dei pedoni nel 2019
text2: Donna colpita, uccisa a LOC: NE Philly Home, portando il totale di omicidi a 356 nel 2019 Una donna è stata uccisa a colpi di arma da fuoco in una casa di LOC: Filadelfia nord-orientale a LOC: Capodanno, portando il numero di omicidi in città a 356 per il 2019, l'anno più mortale in più di un decennio. La sparatoria è avvenuta intorno alle 22:30. nel blocco 5600 di LOC: Frontenac St. nella sezione di LOC: Summerdale. La donna è stata dichiarata morta sul posto. Anche un uomo è stato trovato colpito a colpi di arma da fuoco in casa ed è in condizioni critiche all'LOC: ospedale Einstein. Non è stato immediatamente chiaro chi fosse il tiratore. Le violenze sono seguite ad altri due morti per sparatoria martedì. La polizia dice che un uomo è stato colpito a morte vicino al LOC: Temple University Hospital e un altro nella sezione di LOC: Hunting Park. La polizia ha registrato 356 omicidi quest'anno, tre in più rispetto al 2018. Il conteggio era sceso a circa 250-275 omicidi all'anno dal 2013 a, per guidare la forza di 6.500 membri. PER: OutMISC: ##law dice di essere preparata per la sfida e chiama la violenza armata una priorità assoluta. Ci sono risorse aggiuntive per le persone o le comunità che hanno subito violenza armata. ulteriori informazioni possono essere trovate qui

text1:
KSRE ofrece MISC: Serie de Habilidades Financieras ORG: AgrMISC: ##ícolas ORG: para Mujeres Agrícolas de Kansas
Suscribirse a nuestros servicios es un proceso de tres pasos. Primero debe crear una cuenta y luego debe elegir si desea suscribirse a digital o impreso.

Algunas personas solo quieren ser suscriptores digitales para obtener acceso en línea y otras también quieren recibir la edición impresa.

Si ya es un suscriptor de impresión y desea acceso en línea, es gratis, simplemente tiene que crear una cuenta en línea y luego adjuntar su número de cuenta de suscripción de impresión a la cuenta en línea que cree.
text2:
Here Are MISC: All Of The LOC: US's MISC: Largest Food Deserts
What is a food desert? Imagine having to get all of your groceries from a gas station or local corner store bodega where you're forced to select bags of chips and frozen pizza as sustenance. This is the reality for the millions of citizens who live in food deserts in the LOC: United States. The LOC: United States lacks equal access to food across communities and food availability is scarce in portions of the country known as food deserts.

In 2014, the ORG: United States Department of Agriculture performed a food access study and defined a LOC: US food desert as an area where 33 percent of a city’s residents live more than one mile from a supermarket and 20 percent earn below the poverty line. Many residents of food desert locations do not have cars and lack access to public transportation, making them essentially unable to get to a grocery store. Food desert causes are mostly related to economics. Big chain supermarkets have a hard time turning a profit in impoverished areas, which results in places without food cropping up across the country. The effects are devastating. The obesity rates in these areas are generally higher, meaning life-threatening illnesses like diabetes and heart disease are on the rise. Luckily, new laws and various grassroots organizations are currently working to make healthy, affordable food available nationwide. On a local level, many cities have not just opened up food co-ops and food markets in impoverished areas. Local corner stores are also expanding their inventory. Instead of using all of their shelf space for junk food, they are providing more healthy fresh food options.

To learn more about the issue and what's being done, scan this list of the top food deserts in the LOC: United States.

text1: Rev. PER: Mbaka Releases 2020 Prophecies Rev. Fr. PER: Ejike Mbaka, the Spiritual Director of ORG: Adoration Ministry in LOC: Enugu, southeast LOC: Nigeria, has prophecies for the year 2020. ORG: Naija News reports that Rev. PER: Mbaka released the prophecies during his MISC: Adoration Ministry in LOC: Enugu when he was addressing his congregation last week Thursday. Rev. PER: Mbaka, who predicted President PER: Muhammadu Buhari’s reelection, was quoted to have said during his 2019 MISC: Passover ministration that there would be more hard times for MISC: Nigerians in 2020. The Spiritual Director of ORG: Adoration Ministry said Senator PER: Hope Uzodinma, the 2019 APC governorship candidate for LOC: Imo State, LOC: Southeast Nigeria, would take over the governance of LOC: Imo State from the Incumbent governor, Chief PER: Emeka Ihedioha. While maintaining that all the prophecy in MISC: Adoration ground has comeless but do not fight me. “I am saying this in respect of those who may want to come after me because of the message. If you do that, the MISC: God of PER: Moses, PER: Elijah and PER: Elisha will deal with you. I am only a messenger of God”
text2: 2020: Stop complaining about government A member of the ORG: House of Representatives, Hon. PER: Mufutau Egberongbe, has urged MISC: Nigerians to enter 2020 with a resolution to play positive roles in how they are governed. In a MISC: New Year message he signed and made available to DAORG: ##ILY POST, PER: Egberongbe, who represents LOC: Apapa ORG: Federal Constituency on the platform of the ORG: All Progressives Congress (ORG: APC), said it was time MISC: Nigerians are interested in how they are governed. The lawmaker, however, commended citizens who have always given direction to the government as well as political officials in the current administration. “We constantly need to play active roles in the way we are governed. We should be able to come up with ideas and suggestions on what the government should do and how the government should be run,” the lawmaker said. PER: Egberongbe noted that 2019 came with some challenges for and fights with the executive. “Fighting the executive arm of government does not show our independence or prove that we are working. Anyone who has followed us since we took office would see that we have done a lot in a short while,” he said

text1: Family tell of pensioner’s ‘heartbreaking’ burglary ordeal as new appeal launched The family of a pensioner who died during a burglary in her home spoke today of the dread she must have felt as a fresh police appeal was issued. PER: Maureen Whale, 77, collapsed struggling to breathe as she dialled 999 on December 4, 2018 in LOC: Barnet. In the call, Mrs PER: Whale said: “I’ve just been burgled. Yes, two young men just went into the house and walked off with my handbag. I’m shaking, I’m sorry.” Asked her name, she gasps: “PER: Maureen, I can’t talk, I’m sorry.” There is silence as the operator pleads: “Hang on in there, please.” A post-mortem examination gave the cause of Mrs PER: Whale’s death as coronary hearts death as manslaughter. A £20,000 reward is on offer for information leading to the burglars’ prosecution. Anyone with information is asked to contact police on 020 8785 8099 or call ORG: CrimesMISC: ##toppers anonymously on 0800 555 111
text2: LOC: Grimsby homeowner 'held at gunpoint' by armed robbers Sign up to FREE email alerts from MISC: GrimsbyLive - MISC: Daily Subscribe Thank you for subscribing See our privacy notice MISC: Invalid Email A man was held at gunpoint when robbers raided his home and stole items last night. There was a large police presence including armed response teams in the LOC: Hainton Avenue area of LOC: Grimsby around 7.30pm. One man has been arrested and an imitation firearm recovered by police. Police checked vehicles in the LOC: Nuns Corner area and on the LOC: Nunsthorpe and LOC: Bradley estates for several hours after the armed robbery. (Image: ORG: GNP) ORG: Humberside Police are continuing their investigations today. A police spokeswoman said: "A man has been arrested following reports of an armed robbery at an address on LOC: Hainton Avenue in LOC: Grimsby last night. "It was out non-emergency 101 line quoting crime reference 16/39713/20 or, if you’d prefer not to give you name, you can call the independent charity ORG: Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111. In an emergency always dial 999.

text1: Présidence de la ORG: CDU : un patron en probation Quiconque est élu nouveau président lors de la conférence spéciale du parti en avril doit être réélu en décembre. Cette procédure n'est pas sans risque, mais elle offre une grande opportunité. Le message de la LOC: Konrad - Adenauer-LOC: Haus semblait sobre et contenait un coup d' Etat politique: PER: Armin Laschet, PER: Norbert Röttgen et PER: Friedrich Merz, les trois principaux concurrents pour la présidence de la ORG: CDU, a mutuellement convenu lundi soir que tout à la fin d'MISC: Avril se produire lors de la conférence spéciale du parti, est considérée comme une soi-disant élection partielle. Pour cette raison, tous les membres du conseil d'administration et du présidium seraient à nouveau déterminés lors de la conférence régulière du parti en décembre. Rien de vraiment excitant, c'est ce que ça ressemblait, et pourtant c'est assez différent. La décision a des conséquences pour le gagnant ; il a déjà négocié l'accord, mais avec le recul oblige tout le monde à travailler ensemble. Après tout ce qui s'est passé récemment, c'est une tournure des événements surprenante - et pas une mauvaise base pour tirer une nouvelle force de la crise à la fin
text2: BERLIN – PER: Laschet et PER: Merz annoncent la candidature de la ORG: CDU Le ministre-président de LOC: Rhénanie du Nord - Westphalie PER: Armin Laschet et l'ancien chef de groupe parlementaire PER: Friedrich Merz ont officiellement rejoint PER: Norbert Röttgen, chef de la commission des affaires étrangères du ORG: Bundestag hier (25 février), dans la course pour succéder à PER: Annegret Kramp - Karrenbauer à la tête de l'ORG: Union chrétienne - démocrate (ORG: CDU). PER: Laschet, un modéré qui soutient la politique de la chancelière PER: Angela Merkel, a annoncé qu'il se présenterait avec le soutien du ministre de la ORG: Santé et candidat potentiel, PER: Jens Spahn, qui, à son tour, deviendrait le chef adjoint du parti. "Nous devons réunir notre parti et notre pays, et je veux me présenter pour cela", a expliqué PER: Laschet. PER: Spahn vient de l'aile conservatrice du parti, et ensemble, ce duo vise à unir les deux de la ORG: CDU ayant PER: Spahn comme candidat à la vice-présidence, PER: Röttgen, qui a également annoncé officiellement sa candidature la semaine dernière, a déclaré à la presse qu'il prévoyait de présenter un femme comme adjointe. (PER: Sarah Lawton | EURACTIV.de

text1:
O dynamice po 10 maja i sympatiach LOC: Polski powiatowej
Dynamika przy LOC: Wiejskiej po 10 maja może być zaskakująca. Tak jak sympatie LOC: Polski powiatowej, która zdecyduje o wynikach wyborów 
 ORG: Polityka 
 opublikowano: 26 lutego 2020 
 aktualizacja: 26 lutego 2020 
 ORG: Sejm / autor: sejm.gov.pl 
 REKLAMA 
 Podziel się 
 11 
 Dodatkowym, nieco niedocenianym aspektem nadchodzących wyborów prezydenckich będzie skala i rodzaj dynamiki, jaka zostanie uruchomiona wynikiem majowego głosowania. Nie chodzi bowiem tylko o to, kto na najbliższe pięć lat zasiądzie w fotelu prezydenckim, ale i o to, jakie efekty przyniesie taka czy inna decyzja LOC: Polaków. 
 REKLAMA 
 Sygnalizował to na marginesie swoich ostatnich wypowiedzi PER: Jarosław Kaczyński. Prezes ORG: Prawa i Sprawiedliwości ujął to „stanem emocjonalno-psychologicznym”, jaki - jego zdaniem - może zdominować polską politykę po majowych wyborach. 
 Jeśli pan prezydent uzyska mandat na kolejną kadencję, nasi zwolennicy poczują się wzmocnieni, jeśli nie – w oczywisty sposób będzie to dla nich negatywny sygnał. Biorąc pod uwagę temperaturę dzisiejszego sporu politycznego, to nie jest okoliczność bez znaczenia 
 — ocenił w „ORG: GaMISC: ##zecie Polskiej” PER: Jarosław Kaczyński. 
 Na korytarzach sejmowych i w gabinetach polityków dużo spekuluje się na temat tego, jak mogłoby to wyglądać w praktyce. Prezes ORG: PiS wykluczył scenariusz wcześniejszych wyborów nawet w przypadku przegranej PER: Andrzeja Dudy w wyborach prezydenckich, niemniej jednak można spodziewać się dość wyraźnego procesu frustracji w obozie rządzącym, który raz po raz zderzałby się z wetem głowy państwa. 
 Powiedzmy sobie też szczerze: jest przynajmniej kilka, jeśli nie kilkanaście nazwisk w klubie ORG: PiS, które zaczną się wówczas rozglądać za innymi barwami politycznymi. My wtedy bardzo chętnie i szeroko otworzymy furtki 
 — mówi nam jeden z polityków PSL-Koalicji Polskiej, zwracając uwagę, że sojusz ludowców i Kukiz‘15 przyciągnął w ostatnich miesiącach - na podobnej zasadzie dynamiki politycznej - kilkoro parlamentarzystów kojarzonych dotychczas z Platformą Obywatelską. 
 Ludowcy wiedzą jednak, że zupełnie inne wnioski trzeba będzie przyjąć po zwycięstwie Andrzeja Dudy. 
 Zaczną się podchody na całego. Krucha większość w Senacie stanie pod dużym znakiem zapytania, a i koalicje z ludowcami w sejmikach wojewódzkich będą szturmowane przez polityków PiS 
 — dodaje polityk PSL. 
 Potwierdzają to przedstawiciele PiS w Senacie, którzy są absolutnie pewni tego, że jeśli przed senatorami PSL czy KO stanie alternatywa do frustrującej pracy w ławach opozycyjnych przez kolejne lata. 
 REKLAMA 
 Tuż po wyborach, przy formowaniu większości w Senacie, o transfery było trudno. Emocje olbrzymie, elektorat nie darowałby jednemu czy drugiemu senatorowi. Teraz jest inaczej, a po ewentualnej wygranej prezydenta Dudy będzie jeszcze inaczej, czas będzie działał na naszą korzyść. Jak tylko uznamy, że marszałek Grodzki nie może liczyć na 51 głosów… Cóż, zacznie się gra 
 — słyszymy w Senacie. 
 Krótko mówiąc - PiS może złapać solidny wiatr w żagle, który przełoży się na bardzo namacalne i realne konkrety. Aby tak się jednak stało PiS - a w zasadzie Andrzej Duda - musi utrzymać wyraźną przewagę nad innymi ugrupowaniami i kandydatami w Polsce powiatowej. Wszędzie: od Platformy, przez PSL i Lewicę, na PiS kończąc, przekonani są o kluczowym znaczeniu decyzji Polek i Polaków z terenów poza dużymi miastami. 
 Ciekawie pisał o tym Michał Kolanko, zwracając uwagę na wciąż duże poparcie dla PiS i oczywiście prezydenta Dudy w mniejszych miejscowościach. Dla tych wyborców nie ma dziś realnej, prawdziwej alternatywy od głosowania na Andrzeja Dudę i PiS. Pokazały to kolejne wyniki w ostatnim maratonie wyborczym (choć pole dotyczące mobilizacji ściany wschodniej jest jeszcze dużo większe), ale widać to także po spotkaniach głowy państwa w terenie, a przede wszystkim - słychać w rozmowach z Polakami na co dzień. 
 Jedynym ruchem innym niż PiS jest dla wielu mieszkańców Polski powiatowej zastanowienie się nad wyborem PSL i jego kandydata. O ile w wyborach samorządowych to dość często pojawiające się schematy działania, o tyle przy eurowyborach było zupełnie inaczej (PSL na listach Koalicji Europejskiej), a parlamentarne pozostały nierozstrzygnięte w tej materii - wynik ludowców był mocno „napompowany” działaczami K‘15 i wyborcami z miast, co dotychczas nie miało miejsca. Na wsiach i w miasteczkach mocno górowało PiS. Rywalizację widać symbolicznie na takich zdjęciach jak to poniżej. 
 . / autor: . 
 Jeden z polityków PSL nie kryje tego, że wśród wyborców ludowców naturalnym wyborem jest również głosowanie na PiS, i o to idzie dziś bój: 
 Na moje oko i wyczucie to nawet 70-75 procent wyborców PSL jest w stanie zagłosować na PiS, nie mówiąc o Andrzeju Dudzie, który nie jest zupełnie sklejony z partią. Tak, znam badania, które mówią o tym, że wyborcy PSL w 60% wsparliby w II turze Kidawę-Błońską, ale znając Polskę powiatową - nie wierzę w to. Tam po prostu gardzi się Platformą i jej ludźmi, ludzie zgrzytali zębami nawet na nas, gdy byliśmy z nimi koalicji - ratowały nas tylko pieniądze i konkrety, jakie załatwialiśmy 
 — słyszymy od parlamentarzysty z koniczynką i wpinką „Kosiniak” w klapie marynarki. 
 Inny z ludowców dodaje: 
 70 procent wyborców PSL waha się czy zagłosować na PiS? Pełna zgoda. Dodam, że nawet wśród działaczy PSL poparcie dla Kosiniaka-Kamysza nie jest takie pewne i oczywiste, jak mogłoby się wydawać. Wybory samorządowe czy parlamentarne to zupełnie inna broszka, nie mam poczucia, że lud PSL będzie umierał za Władka 
 — słyszymy. 
 Przebicie się kandydatury Władysława Kosiniaka-Kamysza w Polsce powiatowej będzie kluczowe do odebrania Andrzejowi Dudzie możliwości wygranej już w I turze, a później - jeśli dojdzie do dogrywki 24 maja - to właśnie ci wyborcy mogą decydować o tym, kto zostanie prezydentem. I także dlatego relacje na linii PiS-PSL nie są dziś tak kiepskie jak jeszcze rok temu. Ot, mądrość etapu. 
 ZOBACZ NOWY ODCINEK MAGAZYNU BEZ SPINY:
text2: Let's hold a referendum on civil unions. If I become president, I will fight for the reform of the judiciary - these are your words. Do you want to reform the courts too? Chaos in the judiciary is deepening. President PER: Duda's decision on the muzzle act means that the politicization of the judiciary is as it was in the LOC: People ' s Republic of Poland. In addition, the president's enthusiasm for signing this law was enormous. It seems to me that PER: Andrzej Duda believed that the Minister of Justice PER: Zbigniew Ziobro is trying to reform the judiciary, and in fact he only wants to introduce himself. And real reform is urgently needed, and it cannot be just a return to the past. The first point is to stop the chaos, then introduce justices of the peace - this will speed up the proceedings, reduce court costs, and in itself enough determination to win. Besides, unlike PER: Andrzej Duda and PER: Małgorzata Kidawa - Błońska, I am an independent politician. No chairman or chairman has appointed me

text1: LOC: India vs LOC: New Zealand | MISC: Seven Defeats Out of Eight - LOC: New MISC: Zealand’MISC: s Super Over Misfortunes LOC: New Zealand for the second time in as many games squandered a winning position against LOC: India and allowed the MISC: Super Over miseries to pile on in LOC: Wellington after their earlier loss in LOC: Hamilton. Here’s a look back at LOC: New Zealand’s tryst with MISC: Super Overs. Till date they’ve only won once and that was against LOC: Australia. ORG: West Indies vs LOC: New Zealand in LOC: Auckland (2008) The big hitting PER: Chris Gayle was in town and after both sides had tied on 155. The southpaw clobbered PER: Daniel Vettori for 25 runs as he played out the full over. PER: Jacob Oram and PER: Ross Taylor had their task cut out but PER: Suleimann Benn picked two wickets as LOC: New Zealand could only manage 15. LOC: New Zealand vs LOC: Australia in LOC: Christchurch (2010) 428 runs were scored in 40 overs as LOC: Australia and LOC: New Zealand PER: Munro managed 13 runs in six balls and LOC: India got there effortlessly. PER: KL Rahul smashed 10 runs off the first two balls before he was caught. Then, a fired-up PER: Virat Kohli and PER: Sanju Samson finished the game in style
text2: LOC: New Zealand's MISC: Super Over heartbreaks PER: Ian Smith might as well author a book on LOC: New Zealand's tryst with MISC: Super Overs. PER: Kane Williamson's men have featured in three MISC: Super Overs in the last year including the historic MISC: 2019 World Cup final. On each occasion LOC: New Zealand have lost, the last two coming in MISC: T20MISC: ##I series at home against LOC: England and LOC: India. So imagine the state of PER: Smith's heart, having commentated on each of the games, including the close finish in LOC: Hamilton on Wednesday. For those whose nerves are too frayed to relive the finishes all over again, ORG: ESPNcricinfo has spared you the gory details and put together handy summaries instead. January 29 2020, LOC: Hamilton, v LOC: India To begin with LOC: India did not even know there would be a MISC: Super Over. Defending nine off the final over in regulation time, PER: Mohammed Shami started it watching PER: Ross Taylor bludgeon a full running back at cover. PER: Guptill could then only run a single against a perfect yorker, as PER: Jordan wrapped up the match with another dot ball. July 14 2019, Lord's, v LOC: England You haven't really forgotten how this one played out have you

text1: phpBB • Upgrading from version 3.0.2 Post by PER: Lumpy Burgertushie » Tue Dec 31, 2019 4:19 am Update phpbb 3.0 to latest 3.0 version Backup up your board's files and database Go here and download the latest 3.0 version of phpbb3.0.14 MISC: Full Package Unzip it to your computer. Upload the included folder named "install" into your forum's directory . Browse to yourdomain.com/yourphpbb/install/database_update.php and keep clicking the continue button until it says it is finished. This will take a long time on a large board, maybe hours. Dont give up. Delete the folder named /install/ Hold one foot in the air and spin around in a circle three times saying "I am a phpbb guru". Make a new database backup. Upgrading from phpbb 3.0.x to phpbb 3.1.x things exactly and in order you will be fine.don't forget to make the database backups before starting and after each upgrade.that way, if it crashed on you you can just restore the last database backup and move on from there.good luck,rober
text2:
The magic of the perfect surf photo – in pictures
The three critical elements to surf photography are good light, good surfers and good waves. Most of us photographers get up early to take advantage of all three. Because the ocean is a fickle environment, our window to capture these moments may only come once a month. We study wind and wave charts like meteorologists. We factor in family and jobs, dropping responsibilities more than we should when conditions are right.



When all the elements align, when you’ve made it out there, swum in a turbulent ocean for hours and got home to see an incredible photo, your stoke is off the charts.

The surfers are often strangers who become friends, names and numbers exchanged, meetups discussed and planned shoots coordinated. The photos below, by several photographers, were selected for such a meetup – an evening in southern LOC: California last November with several surf photographers to share work of the past year

text1: Il massimo ufficiale militare di LOC: Taiwan scomparso dopo che l'elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza Il generale dell'aeronautica di LOC: Taiwan PER: Shen Yi - ming (AP Photo) Il massimo ufficiale militare di LOC: Taiwan era tra le tre persone scomparse giovedì dopo che un elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza in una zona montuosa settentrionale vicino alla capitale LOC: Taipei, ha detto il ministero della LOC: Difesa. In una dichiarazione, il ministero ha affermato di aver inviato una squadra per salvare le 13 persone a bordo dell'elicottero MISC: Black Hawk, che includeva il capo di stato maggiore di LOC: Taiwan, il generale dell'aeronautica PER: Shen Yi - ming, e diversi sopravvissuti erano stati trovati. "Alcuni membri dell'equipaggio sono ancora intrappolati all'interno, mentre altri sono usciti", ha detto un portavoce militare in una conferenza stampa trasmessa in diretta televisiva, anche se ulteriori dettagli non sarebbero disponibili fino a quando le truppe non avranno raggiunto l'area dell'incidente. L'elicottero ha effettuato l'atterraggio di emergenza a LOC: New Taipei City dopo che le autorità aeronautiche hanno perso il contatto con esso alle 8, che afferma che LOC: Taiwan come suo territorio da portare sotto il controllo di LOC: Pechino con la forza se necessario, chiama regolarmente l'isola la questione più delicata nei suoi legami con il LOC: Stati Uniti. LOC: Taiwan afferma di essere un paese indipendente chiamato LOC: Repubblica di Cina, il suo nome ufficiale
text2:
Alto funzionario militare di LOC: Taiwan scomparso dopo che l'elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza
Il generale dell'aeronautica PER: Shen Yi - ming. (Fonte: MISC: Wikiepedia) Il generale dell'aeronautica PER: Shen Yi - ming. (Fonte: MISC: Wikipedia)

L'alto funzionario militare di LOC: Taiwan è scomparso dopo che un elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza nel nord di LOC: Taiwan, ha detto giovedì il ministero della ORG: Difesa dell'isola.

Il ministero della ORG: Difesa ha affermato che è in corso una missione di salvataggio per le 13 persone a bordo dell'elicottero MISC: Black Hawk, che include il generale dell'aeronautica PER: Shen Yi - ming, capo di stato maggiore dell'isola.

Lì mancavano ancora persone, incluso PER: Shen, mentre diverse persone sono state trovate vive, ha detto il ministero, aggiungendo che una squadra è stata inviata per la missione di salvataggio.

L'incidente è avvenuto una settimana prima delle elezioni chiave dell'11 gennaio, quando l'isola democratica terrà le elezioni presidenziali e parlamentari.

Per tutte le ultime notizie dal mondo, scarica l'app ORG: Indian Express

text1: Alles Wichtige zur Fahrpreissenkung bei der ORG: Deutschen Bahn  Langstrecken-Verkehrsstifte sind billiger. Aufgrund der niedrigeren Mehrwertsteuer gilt für diese Tickets eine geringere Mehrwertsteuer. Aber eignen sich aber: Wer ist zu früh, verfehlt den Vorteil. Welche Verbraucher wissen müssen. Jahr-jährliche Verbraucher schimpften ständig teurere Tickets der ORG: Deutschen Bahn. Aber im kommenden Jahr ist alles anders: Am 1. Januar reduziert der Konzern die Preise im Fernverkehr um zehn Prozent. Somit betritt die Eisenbahn eine niedrigere MwSt, die von der Bundesregierung vollständig den Kunden entschieden wird. Auf diese Weise reisen mehr Menschen mit dem Zug und klettern das Klima. Für die Verbraucher gibt es viel zu beachten. Was sind deine Tickets billiger? Die Tarifverringerung betrifft alle Reisen im Fernverkehr. Sie beziehen sich nicht nur auf die gewöhnlichen Tickets, sondern auch auf Sparpreise und zusätzlich  Das Unternehmen sieht sich vor allem auf den Nebenstrecken bedroht, wo die Sparpreise der Bahn möglicherweise mit denen des Bus-Unternehmens mithalten können. ORG: Flixbus hat deshalb angekündigt, gegen die Mehrwertsteuer-Senkung zu klagen.
text2: Söder: Politik in LOC: Deutschland muss qualitativ besser werden  Die Politiker müssen mehr denn je zu einer Level-Up-Debattenkultur zahlen, um ihre Ziele aus der Sicht des ORG: CSU BOSS PER: Markus Söder durchzusetzen. "Ich bin die feste Überzeugung, die Politik muss heute besser qualitativ besser sein", sagte der Premierminister der deutschen Presseagentur ORG: Bayerns in LOC: München. LOC: Deutschland ist ein Land mit einer qualitativ hochwertigen Wissenschaft und Wirtschaft, Kunst und Gesellschaft. "Die Politik muss daher qualitativer Betonung diskutieren. Moderne Führung bedeutet, ohne zu stehend zu bleiben. Es ist viel anspruchsvoller als zuvor geworden." Mit Blick auf die Stabilisierungsrolle der ORG: CSU der ORG: CSU des ORG: CSU von SPER: ##öder betonte er, dass die Partei auch die Partei unter seiner Führung betonte, die nicht Ihre unvorhersehbare nicht gepflegte Unberechenbarkeit seit Jahrzehnten verlieren: "Die Stabilität ist nicht im Sinn. Stabilität bedeutet nicht, nur um das andere Recht z  in die Rolle des anderen hinein versetzen können. text1: Вот почему вам не следует стирать белье в MISC: Новый год Подпишитесь на БЕСПЛАТНЫЕ ежедневные оповещения по электронной почте от MISC: Devonlive - отчет о выходных Подпишитесь Спасибо за подписку См. наше уведомление о конфиденциальности Не удалось подписаться, повторите попытку позже Неверный адрес электронной почты Мы все слышали об этом не повезло оставить свои украшения после MISC: Двенадцатой ночи, но как насчет стирки? Что ж, кажется, есть несколько суеверий, связанных со стиркой в MISC: Новый год, и ни одно из них не является хорошим. На самом деле, если верить таким суевериям, стирка 1 января смоет любую удачу на следующий год. Некоторые считают, что член семьи может быть смыт водой или умереть в течение года, сообщает ORG: Manchester Evening MISC: News. Неизвестно, откуда взялось это странное суеверие, но, похоже, многие люди его соблюдают. Некоторые говорят, что любое благополучие, которое есть в доме, остается внутри. В то время как многие суеверия связаны с едой, свинина считается удачей, поскольку свиньи добывают себе пищу, а лобстеры или крабы, по-видимому, приносят несчастье, поскольку они движутся боком.
text2: Полиция LOC: Рок - Хилла расследует тройную стрельбу в новогоднюю ночь РОК-ХИЛЛ, LOC: Южная Каролина — Полиция LOC: Рок - Хилла расследует стрельбу, в результате которой три человека попали в больницу вскоре после полуночи в день MISC: Нового года. Стрельба произошла около 00:22 1 января. Три жертвы были застрелены в доме на LOC: Букер -LOC: Вашингтон - стрит. Полиция заявляет, что расследует преступление как покушение на убийство, но не обнародовала информацию о возможном подозреваемом или мотиве. Сообщения о стрельбе поступили около 12 часов. 22:00 в доме на LOC: Букер -LOC: Вашингтон - стрит. По прибытии полиция сообщает, что они обнаружили 64-летнего мужчину с огнестрельным ранением в грудь, 42-летнюю женщину с огнестрельным ранением в живот и 53-летнего мужчину с огнестрельным ранением в грудь. плечо.   Все пострадавшие доставлены в больницу, травмы несовместимы с жизнью. Полиция LOC: РORG: ##окLOC: - Хилла сообщает, что они все еще расследуют причины стрельбы и не обнародовали никакой информации о возможных подозреваемых. Детективы говорят, что инцидент, похоже, был единичным в это время.

text1: El jefe de policía de LOC: Phnom Penh insta a sus agentes a frenar los delitos El jefe de policía de LOC: Phnom Penh insta a sus agentes a frenar los delitos El jefe de policía de LOC: Phnom Penh, el teniente general PER: Sar Thet, ha pedido a sus agentes de policía que hagan todo lo posible para acabar con los delitos en toda la capital a pesar de las caídas en cifras. Hablando en una ceremonia de promoción en LOC: Phnom Penh el lunes, el teniente general PER: Thet dijo que los casos penales disminuyeron en 2019 gracias a los esfuerzos concertados para tomar medidas enérgicas contra los delitos. “Según el informe de 2019, los delitos graves se han reducido a 31 casos y los casos de delitos menores se han reducido a 177 casos”, dijo el teniente general PER: Thet. Dijo que los policías deben velar por el cumplimiento de la ley, la seguridad y el orden público del pueblo. “Nuestros oficiales de policía deben trabajar más duro para tomar medidas enérgicas contra los delitos para que disminuyan”, dijo PER: Eng. San Chey, director ejecutivo de ORG: Affiliated Network for Social Accountability, se hizo eco de las preocupaciones de PER: Kim Eng. “Aunque los delitos penales han disminuido, la gente todavía se preocupa por los problemas de drogas, especialmente los juegos de azar”, dijo.
text2: Autista di camion accusato di DWI dopo aver colpito a morte un pedone alla vigilia di MISC: Capodanno Martedì un camionista è stato arrestato per aver colpito a morte un pedone a LOC: East Harlem. Un portavoce della polizia ha detto che l'incidente è avvenuto intorno alle 17:00. la vigilia di MISC: Capodanno all'incrocio tra LOC: E. 125 Street e LOC: Madison Avenue. Un autista di un camion ORG: SafeMISC: ##lite, identificato come PER: Farkell Hopkins, stava guidando in direzione est sulla LOC: 125th Street quando ha colpito il pedone, che stava tentando di attraversare la strada a metà isolato. PER: Farkell, che è rimasto sulla scena, è stato accusato di omicidio stradale e guida in stato di ebbrezza. Il ORG: Daily News ha notato che la vittima, ritenuta sulla quarantina, non aveva un documento d'identità e la polizia sta ancora lavorando per identificarlo. Statistiche del ORG: Dipartimento dei trasporti a partire da lunedì scorso anche a lunedì, da 115 in tutto il 2018. Ventinove ciclisti sono morti, quasi il triplo delle vittime dell'anno scorso. Abbiamo contattato il DOT per ottenere il conteggio finale delle vittime dei pedoni nel 2019

text1: Nach zehn Minuten war der Bundesanwalt wieder draussen – Laubers Kurzauftritt vor der Geschäftsprüfungskommission Am Mittwoch um 13.29 Uhr erschien PER: Michael Lauber, Bundesanwalt, aus einem Seiteneingang kommend, unten in der grossen Eingangshalle im Bundeshaus. Bei den MISC: Drei Eidgenossen bog er ab und stieg die Treppe in Richtung NationalLOC: ##ratssaal hoch und verschwand im Saal, in dem die Geschäftsprüfungskommissionen (GPK) von National- und Ständerat tagten. Unterwegs grüsste er den Journalisten freundlich, wenn auch mit einem etwas gequälten Lächeln. Rund zehn Minuten später, um 13.41 Uhr, war Laubers Auftritt vor dem Parlament schon wieder vorbei. Die Mission war offensichtlich nicht erfolgreich. Beim Verlassen des Nationalratssaals wirkte er enerviert, er fuchtelte mit einer Hand und redete, seine schwarze Mappe in der anderen,liches Amtsverständnis stösst auf wenig Verständnis. Der AB-BA unter dem früheren MISC: Zuger Regierungsrat PER: Hanspeter Uster, der die Aufsichtsschraube gegenüber LauPER: ##ber anzog, wird ein über alles gesehen gutes Zeugnis ausgestellt
text2: Laubers Sitz wackelt: Gerichtskommission macht ersten Schritt zu Amtsenthebungs-Verfahren Möglichst dann soll auch der Entscheid fallen, ob tatsächlich ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren eingeleitet wird. Dies sagte der Kommissionspräsident, FDP-Ständerat PER: Andrea Caroni (ORG: FDP, AR), gestern Abend vor den Medien. Es wäre das erste Amtsenthebungsverfahren in der Geschichte des modernen Bundesstaates. Es ist ein Datum, das wohl auch PER: Michael Lauber nicht so schnell vergessen wird. Gestern Mittwoch hat die Gerichtskommission der vereinigten Bundesversammlung einen ersten Schritt hin zu einem Amtsenthebungsverfahren gegen den Bundesanwalt gemacht. Bevor jedoch entschieden wird, ob ein solches tatsächlich eingeleitet wird, hat LauPER: ##ber das Recht, vor der 17-köpfigen Parlamentskommission seine Sicht der Dinge darzulegen. Dazu hat ihn die Kommission für kommenden Dienstag aufgeboten. Die Zahl der Vorwürfe Er sei froh, wie sachlich die Kommission gestern gearbeitet habe. $Noch im Herbst war Lauber – gegen den Willen der Gerichtskommission – vom Parlament knapp wiedergewählt worden. Er erhielt vor allem Support aus ORG: SVP, ORG: FDP und ORG: SP

text1: Multan a hijo de payaso "PER: Chimbombín" en LOC: Comalapa cuando ambos iban a "ganarse los frijolitos" El hijo de PER: Douglas Hernández Fajardo, conocido artísticamente como el payaso "PER: Chimbombín", fue multado este miércoles por la mañana, tras ser detenido en un retén policial y detectarle que manejaba sin licencia de conducir el vehículo en el que se transportaba junto con su padre. El hecho sucedió frente al LOC: monumento Cristo de La Paz, en la carretera a LOC: Comalapa. El retén se encontraba ubicado sobre el carril que conduce hacia el LOC: Aeropuerto Internacional Monseñor Romero, como parte de los planes de control policial que habitualmente se instalan esa carretera en días festivos. Cuando fue detenido, al hijo de "PER: Chimbombín" se le impuso una multa económica de $ 57.14, ya que no pudo presentar la licencia en vista de que solo le el payaso PER: Chimbombín sobre la sanción impuesta a su hijo. Video LPG / V. Cea. pic.twitter.com/sgJP5Nv7kt — ORG: La Prensa Gráfica (@prensagrafica) January 1, 202
text2: Policía multa al hijo del payaso PER: Chimbombín por manejar sin licencia en la carretera a LOC: Comalapa El padre intercedió para que su hijo no fuera multado. Sin embargo, las autoridades siempre lo pusieron una infracción de $57.14. Por PER: C. Fuentes Ene 01, 2020- 15:30 El hijo del payaso PER: Chimbombín, que aún no ha sido identificado, fue uno de los primeros conductores en ser multados en el inicio de 2020 por infringir la MISC: Ley de Transporte Terrestre, Tránsito y Seguridad Vial. Fue sorprendido durante un control vehicular que la ORG: Policía de Tránsito instaló sobre el kilómetro 8 de la carretera a LOC: Comalapa. PER: Chimbombín, que acompañaba a su hijo en el momento en que fueron detenidos, explicó que se dirigían a trabajar y por el cansancio y que había pedido a su hijo que le ayudara a conduc navidad y año nuevo, se realizaron 610 controles vehiculares en los que se aplicaron un total de 7,027 pruebas de alcoholemia a automovilistas. Aproximadamente hubo 113 detenidos por conducción peligrosa a nivel nacional

text1: MISC: Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham Cannot Be Compared With Baahubali: MISC: Mohanlal PER: Mohanlal, the complete actor is all set to release his ambitious project MISC: Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham, very soon. text1: Six smart money management moves for 2020 Money is important. And the start of a new year is generally a good time to make some solid resolutions to manage your finances. text2: My 2019 in MISC: AsiaOne: I found out what makes MISC: Singaporean men so desirable 2019 is the year of revelations. Self-revelations most of all. For the sake of a few stories, I've had to dive deep into whether I wanted to have more kids (the answer is probably no) and reveal some never-before-spoken-about aspects of my marriage to a foreigner. I've realised it's tough exposing a part of yourself online to thousands, especially for someone who normally keeps things close to my chest. But it's a retrospective and introspective exercise (much like this one) that has its benefits — producing fresh insights, for one. In my case, it made me more appreciative and kinder to the husband. My desire to maintain some online privacy also went out the window when I was asked to contribute some personal content for MISC: Instagram. But as with all is the thief of joy?). Other lessons gleaned: just be yourself — somebody, somewhere will love you for it, and simply do more of what makes you happy. Here's to a wonderful 2020 for all. candicecai@asiaone.co

text2: PER: Klobuchar PER: Jabs Trump per aver trascorso 1 giorno su 5 nel 2019 in un club di golf: "Ho trascorso 0 giorni sul campo da golf" Il senatore democratico PER: Amy Klobuchar, candidato alla presidenza del 2020, mercoledì ha chiamato il presidente PER: Donald Trump dopo che un rapporto ha scoperto che aveva trascorso uno dei cinque giorni nel 2019 in un golf club. text1: Why MISC: Evangelicals May Be Hardwired to Believe Trump ' s Falsehoods President PER: Donald Trump lies so often that it is no longer shocking when it happens. Many psychologists have pointed out that he is constantly gaslighting his base—a term that refers to a strategic attempt to get others to question their direct experience of reality. Most of his fervent supporters are convinced that PER: Trump is the harbinger of truth when it comes to important issues like climate change—which he has said is a “hoax perpetrated by the MISC: Chinese government.” This has contributed to fake news and propaganda. Given its negative impact on society, it is important to understand why certain groups of people are more vulnerable to believing unsupported lies than others. The fields of psychology and neuroscience can offer insight. One reason PER: Trump supporters believe him comes from a basic fact about the brain: it takes more mental effort to reject reflected in how we educate our youth. Additionally, we must create an awareness of the fact that for the human mind, believing is more of a reflex than a careful and methodical action. This article was originally published at MISC: Raw Story
text2:
LETTER: PER: Donald Trump and evangelicals
President PER: Donald Trump. (ORG: AP Photo/PER: Patrick Semansky)

According to recent reports, MISC: Christian approval for President PER: Donald Trump has waned, with predictions that MISC: Christian voters won’t come out in the 2020 election for Mr. PER: Trump as they did in 2016. Which begs this question: Who will they vote for?

With none of the MISC: Democratic presidential hopefuls courting this voting bloc (yet), a definitive answer is unknown. Some (MISC: Christians) may not vote or may vote for President PER: Trump regardless. But this is certain: MISC: Christians believe that the MISC: Almighty works through, not around, whoever is voted into office.

text1: ¿Qué acciones debo comprar en 2020? El contexto político de 2019 realmente puso a prueba los nervios de los inversores y creo que esto continuará a lo largo de 2020. A pesar de un aire de calma (junto con un repunte del precio de las acciones) que desciende sobre los mercados después de las elecciones, creo que esto será de corta duración. . La victoria de los conservadores detuvo la incertidumbre del mercado que lo había estado agobiando, pero a medida que la realidad de un 'ORG: BrMISC: ##exit de MISC: Boris' se vuelve cada vez más real, creo que las consecuencias para las empresas británicas serán claras. Los temas ambientales, sociales y de gobernanza (ESG) y de sostenibilidad han estado en la mente de los inversores a medida que las crecientes preocupaciones sobre el cambio climático subieron una o dos velocidades en 2019. Furiosos incendios forestales en LOC: Australia, reunión de PER: Greta Thunberg con Sir PER: David Attenborough y discurso de apertura de PER: Mark Carney advirtiendo a las grandes empresas que asuman la responsabilidad antes de que se espere que aumenten los precios en 2020. Me gustan estas dos empresas como compras potenciales para 2020, ya que son empresas de larga data con un catálogo de marcas conocidas y el estado ORG: FTSE 100. También creo que se mantendrán firmes en la LOC: Gran Bretaña posterior al ORG: Brexit.
text2:
PER: LeBron James, ORG: Lakers ring in 2020 after strong start to season
EL SEGUNDO — To welcome in the next decade, the ORG: Lakers shed their purple and gold for a night, opting for black-tie suits instead.

They were all over each other’s social media feeds, dancing and smoking cigars on Monday night as PER: LeBron James celebrated his 35th birthday.

Because the ORG: Lakers play the ORG: Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night, MISC: New Year ’ s Eve celebrations are expected to be significantly toned down. PER: James said he only decided three days before the big night that he would have a party at all, which his wife PER: Savannah helped assemble on the short turnaround. It wasn’t just a birthday, but a turning of the page on the year as well.

“I was able to kill two birds with one stone, get my teammates there, coaching staff, my family, my friends, people that’s been around for quite a while and we had a heck of a time,” he said. “So it was another opportunity for us to bond, which we did. And if it brings us closer, then fantastic. That’s what it’s all about for me, bringing us closer to family as possible.”

The ORG: Lakers ended 2019 pretty tight-knit, with a strong body of work behind them. Leading the ORG: Western Conference standings and finishing a challenging December slate at 9-5, some of their hardest work is behind them even though the bulk of the schedule remains.

The year wrapped on an upbeat note with wins over the ORG: Portland Trail Blazers and ORG: Dallas Mavericks. After that second victory, Coach PER: Frank Vogel had a chance to look at the footage of his team holding the No. 1 offense in the ORG: NBA to just 95 points – to his surprise, he saw some opportunities where his defense (104.8 defensive rating, No. 7 in the ORG: NBA) could be even better.

That’s the ORG: Lakers’ 2019 resolution: They’re still looking for the perfect performance.

“It’s just reason for optimism that we still have a long way to go and a lot of room for improvement,” he said. “It’s exciting what we can be.”

A big part of that has been success against the teams they are supposed to beat: The ORG: Lakers are 17-0 against teams under .500 this season. They’ll have an opportunity to extend that perfection with upcoming home games against Phoenix, New Orleans, Detroit and New York.

The Lakers warmed to the challenge of their tough schedule last month, playing a host of teams bound for the playoffs. The concern, Vogel acknowledged, is that over a third of the way in against less-than-stellar competition, complacency can sneak in.

“It’s a different sort of stretch right now,” he said. “I think we begin to enter the dog days of the NBA season, which is like now until All-Star break where it gets a little monotonous and there’s a little bit of a grind and hopefully we can get through that stretch. And then once All-Star break hits, you’re in the home stretch after that.”

One of the factors the Lakers feel is in their favor is chemistry. Multiple players have cited the 1-through-15 chemistry on the roster as a strength, and James’ birthday party was the latest event where the Lakers have largely shown up off the court as a group.

James pointed to his youth league days as a model: When he was a young player, he and his teammates would go to parks or malls and play video games together.

“Not only did it influence the way I play on the court, having an effect on how I play today, it also had an influence of how I grew up with my friends, too, and having that brotherhood,” he said. “If you know anything about my childhood, the guys that I grew up playing ball are still around, they’re still like my best friends.”

The same concept is important to his NBA teams, James said, which is among the reasons everyone was invited. The feeling of the Lakers is that off-court chemistry will help form on-court bonds that can help them in competitive games.

It also leads to some nice post-party texts.

“The best thing about it is that my teammates said how much of a time they had,” he said. “My family and my friends had a heck of a time. Got a lot of messages this morning saying how much fun it was, how much love was in the air. So that’s what makes it cool for me. The people around me had a good time.”

🎥 LeBron: "We ended 2019 in a good position to continue to get better, and play better basketball in January than we did in December.” pic.twitter.com/CZnJC3MsC6 — Los Angeles Lakers (@Lakers) January 1, 2020

text1: ORG: Red Bull con deseos de triunfar en ORG: F1 con PER: Max Verstappen Por PER: Guillermo Abogado González LOC: Milton Keynes, Ing., 1 Ene (ORG: Notimex).- En la escudería ORG: Red Bull tienen claro el panorama, triunfar en la temporada 2020 de la MISC: Fórmula 1 con su piloto estelar, el holandés PER: Max Verstappen, mientras que en el asiento coequipero las dudas siguen. PER: Verstappen, quien ganó tres MISC: Grandes Premios en 2019, es la carta fuerte del equipo de LOC: Milton Keynes, pero eso no sucede con el tailandés PER: Alexander Albon, quien al menos comenzará como compañero de PER: Max en esta nueva campaña. La incertidumbre en ORG: Red Bull aparece debido a que en 2019 confiaron en el francés PER: Pierre Gasly, pero a mitad de campaña lo enviaron a ORG: Toro Rosso para subir al propio PER: Albon. Incluso los dos conductores que están en ORG: Toro Rosso, PER: Gasly del campeón PER: Lewis Hamilton y del finlandés PER: Valtteri Bottas, así como por delante de los ORG: Cavallino RampanPER: ##te del monegasco PER: Charles Leclerc y el alemán PER: Sebastian Vettel. -Fin de nota- NTX/GAGO/LH
text2: El asiento más caliente de la parrilla en 2020... y PER: Alonso De los veinte pilotos de MISC: Fórmula 1 que competirán en 2020, siete son o han sido parte del programa de ORG: Red Bull. Están PER: Verstappen, PER: Albon, PER: Gasly y PER: KPER: ##vyat, estuvieron PER: Sainz, PER: Ricciardo y PER: Vettel. Son mayoría, un 35%, y eso habla muy bien de la academia más exitosa de la historia del automovilismo. El problema es que no viene nadie por detrás que convenza. Los dos pilotos de ORG: Toro Rosso ya pasaron por el primer equipo sin éxito, y tampoco ayudan las prisas de sus jefes, que han gastado demasiadas balas en poco tiempo. Estas y otras circunstancias convertirán al segundo RB16, el que no pertenece a ORG: Mad Max, en el asiento más caliente de la temporada 2020. Por lo pronto, será del tailandés PER: Alex Albon, de 23 años, rookie en 2019 que pasado común en ORG: McLaren), pero mejor no despejar balones fuera: fuentes de la casa japonesa confirman a ORG: AS que la elección de pilotos es exclusiva de ORG: Red Bull y ORG: Honda no toma parte ni ejerce vetos. text1: Ab sofort: Integrierter Rechtsschutz für analoge und digitale Welt  Ab sofort: Integrierter Rechtsschutz für die analoge und digitale Welt Immer mehr Österreicherinnen und Österreicher sind von Online-Betrug, Phishing- und Stalking-Angriffen betroffen. Die neue Rechtsschutzversicherung der LOC: Wiener ORG: Städtischen bietet jetzt auch Schutz in der digitalen Welt. LOC: Wien (OTS) - Ein bisschen Unachtsamkeit oder einfach nur Pech - jeder kann sehr schnell in eine Situation geraten, in der Rechtsbeistand erforderlich ist. Die Reichweite ist enorm: Ob im Alltag, im Straßenverkehr, am Arbeitsplatz oder im Internet – Rechtsberatung oder allfällige Prozesskosten können schnell mehrere Tausend Euro betragen. Gerade im Bereich des Internets steigt der Bedarf an rechtlicher Unterstützung – neue Risiken wie Online-Betrug, Phishing im Online-Banking, Datenschutz, Urheberrecht oder auch Mobbing nehmen seit einigen Jahren stark zu. „Der Bedarf a : c.kreuzer @ wienerstaedtische.at PER: Ralf Maurer Tel.: +43 (0)50 350-21227 E-Mail: r.maurer @ wienerstaedtische.at Die Presseaussendung finden Sie auch unter
text2: I learned how to make authentic MISC: Wiener schnitzel at the home of the dish in LOC: Vienna, and was shocked by how technical it was LOC: Wiener schnitzel is the most iconic dish of LOC: Vienna, LOC: Austria. Historic restaurant ORG: FiglLOC: ##müller is the best-loved place in the city when it comes to schnitzel, and when I was in LOC: Vienna recently I had a cooking lesson from head chef PER: Markus Brunner. I was surprised to find there was a lot more skill involved than I'd expected, and all the details were key to creating such a special dish. Schnitzel is simple but incredibly delicious when done right, however, it's also quite a lot of effort to make at home, so I wish there was a ORG: Figlmüller in LOC: London. MISC: Visit MISC: InsideORG: ##r's homepage for more stories. Schnitzel is one of the best-loved symbols of LOC: Vienna — and one of LOC: Austria's most famous instead, and they still do. text1:
Geburtenbilanz 2019 erneut positiv
Die Geburtenbilanz in LOC: Österreich war 2019 erneut positiv. Es gab im vergangenen Jahr um 1.918 mehr Geburten als Sterbefälle. Das berichtete die ORG: Statistik Austria am Donnerstag. Im Zusammenspiel von Geburten und Sterbefällen verzeichnete 2019 insbesondere LOC: Wien einen starken Geburtenüberschuss.

Die Zahl der Neugeborenen lag im vergangenen Jahr laut vorläufigen Ergebnissen von ORG: Statistik Austria bei 84.221. Das entspricht einem Rückgang von 1,5 Prozent im Vergleich zu 2018. Im gleichen Zeitraum verstarben insgesamt 82.303 Personen, zwei Prozent weniger als im Vorjahr. Bezogen auf die Bevölkerung entsprach dies zehn Geburten sowie neun Sterbefällen je 1.000 Einwohner. Diese Daten enthalten auch 465 im Ausland Geborene (0,6 Prozent), deren Mütter in LOC: Österreich hauptgemeldet sind, sowie 637 im Ausland verstorbene Personen mit Hauptwohnsitz in LOC: Österreich (0,8 Prozent).

Überdurchschnittlich war die Zahl der Geburten bezogen auf die Bevölkerung (Geburtenrate) in LOC: Vorarlberg, LOC: Wien, LOC: Salzburg und in LOC: Oberösterreich, während im LOC: Burgenland, LOC: Kärnten, LOC: Niederösterreich und der LOC: Steiermark die Zahl der Sterbefälle bezogen auf die Bevölkerung (Sterberate) über dem Österreich-Schnitt lag.

Neben LOC: Wien (+4.075) wurden auch in LOC: Oberösterreich (+1.422), LOC: Vorarlberg (+1.273), LOC: Tirol (+1.268) und LOC: Salzburg (+1.056) mehr Geburten als Sterbefälle registriert. Weniger Neugeborene als Gestorbene gab es - wie bereits in den Vorjahren - in LOC: Niederösterreich (-2.741), der LOC: Steiermark (-1.715), in LOC: Kärnten (-1.557) und im LOC: Burgenland (-1.163).

Quelle: APA

text1: LOC: North KoreaMISC: ' s Warning to America : End Your ' Hostile Policy ' Or Get Nothing In the most anticipated speech of his career today, LOC: North Korea’s PER: Kim Jong - un told hundreds of cadre from the ORG: Workers ’ Party of Korea to prepare for a long-term standoff with the LOC: United States over its drive to “seek its own political and diplomatic interests” in LOC: Korea while “wasting time away under the signboard of dialogue and negotiations.” But to the obvious surprise of many LOC: U. S. experts, PER: Kim hedged on making any move that would cross a red line for the PER: Trump administration or LOC: the Pentagon. Instead, he left the door open for further negotiations over peace and denuclearization – but only if the LOC: United States “rolls back its hostile policy towards the ORG: DPRK” and helps build “a lasting and durable peace-keeping mechanism” on the peninsula. In some ways, Kim’ spy planes, based primarily in nearby LOC: Okinawa and carrying the most sophisticated surveillance equipment in the world, combed MISC: Korean skies looking for any signs of new tests that would violate the moratorium. Read the original article
text2: Here’s LOC: North Korea’s MISC: New Year’s gift to the world We didn’t wind up getting that MISC: Christmas present from PER: Kim Jong - un that he promised. (Not even the vase that President PER: Trump suggested.) While most of us were expecting either a weapon’s test or a missile launch, all remained quiet in the hermit nation for the remainder of the year. But this morning the dictator released a statement through his country’s state-run media outlets that appears to explain what the real “present” was going to be. As of today, LOC: North Korea is no longer considering itself bound to the weapons testing moratorium agreed to between PER: Kim and PER: Trump. (ORG: NY Times) LOC: North Korea’s leader, PER: Kim Jong - un, said his country no longer felt bound by its self-imposed moratorium on testing nuclear weapons and long-range ballistic missiles, its official media reported on Wednesday, the strongward path domestically but in terms of our negotiations with LOC: North Korea, we’re already hitting a sour note. And with LOC: Russia and LOC: China courting PER: Kim’s favor these days, I’m not particularly hopeful of the situation improving any time soon

text1: 2020 y el progreso humano Este es el momento en que los calendarios pasan a un nuevo año y a una nueva década (con disculpas a quienes sostienen que eso no sucederá realmente hasta 2021). MISC: Enero presenta un nuevo comienzo. Un nuevo comienzo. Se han informado muchas malas noticias en el año y la década salientes. Muchos comentaristas de esta temporada parecen obligados a ofrecer un contrapeso, recordando amablemente a los lectores que se está avanzando mucho. De hecho, uno podría presentar un argumento convincente de que estos son los mejores tiempos de la historia humana. En todo el mundo, la pobreza está retrocediendo y la educación y la alfabetización van en aumento. Nunca en la historia tanta gente ha estado tan bien materialmente. Un índice mundial muestra que la prosperidad aumentó en 148 países y disminuyó solo en 19 durante la última década. Durante las últimas tres décadas, más de mil millones de personas en todo el mundo han salido de la pobreza extrema, de acuerdo con la creencia en la maldad irremediable del hombre, y en la futilidad del esfuerzo humano”. La esperanza, a la que a veces se hace referencia como la expectativa de algo bueno, podría ser solo el enfoque en el que basar el pensamiento y las acciones en el próximo año.
text2: EDITORIALE: C'è molto da celebrare all'inizio di un nuovo decennio "La vita è migliorata enormemente negli ultimi 250 anni ... (e) continuerà a migliorare in quasi ogni dimensione; salute, ricchezza, longevità, nutrizione, alfabetizzazione, pace, libertà e così via”. La gente festeggia il nuovo anno a LOC: Times Square a LOC: New York, mercoledì 1 gennaio 2020, (ORG: AP MISC: Photo/PER: Craig Ruttle) Per molti, la nascita di un nuovo anno è un momento di riflessione e ottimismo, un'occasione per una risoluzione piena di speranza e ripristino personale. Ma questi non sono tempi normali. Conflitti politici apparentemente senza fine hanno creato un clima di rabbia, ansia e agitazione in molti ambienti, portando a un accresciuto pessimismo sul futuro. Ma mentre le nostre controversie sono effettivamente diventate più al vetriolo e divisivo, è importante prendere un aspetto più completo e PER: Baumeister. "Non importa... chi vince le elezioni presidenziali, la persona media in LOC: America e nel resto del mondo diventerà con ogni probabilità più sana e ricca". E questo è un motivo per brindare al 2020 piuttosto che per temerlo

text1: ORG: CBI arrests DRI ADG, two businessmen in Rs 3 crore graft case LUDHIANA: The ORG: Central Bureau of Investigation (ORG: CBI) on Wednesday arrested a senior ORG: Indian Revenue Service (ORG: IRS) officer — who is the additional director general (ADG) of the zonal unit of the ORG: Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (ORG: DRI), LOC: Ludhiana — in a Rs 3-crore bribery case.Prior to ADG PER: Chandar Shekhar’s arrest, ORG: CBI nabbed two businessmen — PER: Rajesh Dhanda of LOC: Ludhiana and PER: Anup Joshi of LOC: Delhi — on Tuesday afternoon from a five-star hotel in LOC: Delhi with Rs 25-lakh cash, which they had allegedly accepted on behalf of the ORG: DRI officer. PER: Dhanda is a prominent name in the city’s textile circle and has a huge business interest in LOC: Dubai, while PER: Joshi is a customs clearing agent.A statement issue he grabbed national limelight when in two separate operations in LOC: Kashmir Valley, the ORG: DRI, in a joint operation with ORG: Army and other agencies, had seized heroin worth Rs 120 crore along with a huge cache of arms and ammunition from the border fence
text2:
ORG: CBI arrests ADG of ORG: Revenue Intelligence in Rs 25 lakh bribery case
The ORG: CBI on Wednesday arrested an Additional Director General of ORG: Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (ORG: DRI) PER: Chander Shekhar and a middleman in connection with Rs 25 lakh bribery case, officials said.

The searches are going on in LOC: New Delhi, LOC: Noida and LOC: Ludhiana, they said.

According to the ORG: DRI web site, PER: Chander Shekhar is posted as ADG, LOC: Ludhiana.

The agency had arrested the middleman while he was allegedly receiving the bribe on behalf of the officer, they said.

During the questioning, the middleman told the sleuths that the bribe was allegedly for the officer, they said.

The agency suspects it to be a part payment of a huge bribe which was discussed between the two, they said.

text1: Cuánto pagará cada propiedad de aumento del Inmobiliario con la nueva ley Después de una larga pulseada con la oposición, el gobierno de PER: Axel Kicillof ya cuenta con la MISC: Ley Fiscal 2020, que contiene subas en el ORG: Inmobiliario, ORG: Automotor (ORG: Patente) y en categorías de ORG: Ingresos Brutos, entre otros. Uno de los principales ejes de la polémica se instaló sobre el impuesto Inmobiliario -tanto urbano edificado y baldío como el rural- por la inclusión por parte del gobierno de incrementos de hasta el 75 por ciento para las propiedades de mayor valuación fiscal. Según explicó la LOC: Provincia, la intención era acentuar el carácter progresivo del esquema fiscal de la LOC: Provincia, haciendo que las subas sean más importantes para los sectores con mayor capacidad contributiva. La oposición, por su parte, aseguró que con la redacción original esa suba del 75 por ciento iba a recaer sobre sectores de clase media. Finalmente, 50 por ciento de aumento, y entre 84 mil y 630 mil, pagarán 75 por ciento de aumento. Finalmente, cuando las propiedades urbanas no edificadas superen los 630 mil pesos de valuación fiscal, el aumento del Inmobiliario será del 90 por ciento
text2: Cambios en el ORG: Inmobiliario para destrabar la MISC: Ley Fiscal El gobierno bonaerense entregó a ORG: Juntos por el Cambio una nueva propuesta fiscal que incorpora algunos de los cambios exigidos por la oposición e introdujo una modificación en la escala del impuesto inmobiliario, que mantendrá una suba del 75%, aunque alcanzará a menos propiedades. El texto, que aún no ingresó a la ORG: Legislatura, fue entregado esta tarde a los representantes de ORG: Juntos por el Cambio, durante un encuentro que encabezó la vicegobernadora PER: Verónica Magario. La oposición, que más temprano había presentado un pliego con nueve puntos que incluía un tope máximo del 55% de aumento para el ORG: Inmobiliario, se encontraba reunida esta noche para analizar la letra fina del proyecto. Según se indicó, la propuesta duplica el valor fiscal de las partidas alcanzadas por el aumento del 75%, alcanzando a menos propiedades. «Esto elevan los montos imponibles de la facturación de las pymes rurales e industriales. También adelantó que se definió que los beneficiarios de la MISC: Asignación Universal por Hijo «no paguen impuestos en la LOC: provincia de Buenos Aires

text2: One person is dead, the other is in the hospital. A tragic fire in LOC: Silesia. One person was killed and the other was seriously injured in a fire in a kiosk in LOC: Chorzów (LOC: Śląskie Voivodeship). Even before the arrival of the firefighters, the policemen rushed to the rescue, they did not manage to extinguish the fire or save the person inside the structure. The tragic fire took place at LOC: Wolności Street in LOC: Chorzów. For reasons previously unknown, the kiosk there burst into flames. The fire was noticed by the policemen passing nearby. When they ran to the place, they noticed a burned man next to him who told them that his friend might be inside. The policemen notified the relevant services, and they themselves undertook the extinguishing action of the lagoon. The identity of the victim is currently being established. An autopsy has already been commissioned to determine the cause of death. The services were working on the spot, wanting to establish the detailed course and causes of the tragedy

text1: A partir de hoy aumenta costo de pasaportes para mexicanos en el extranjero A partir de hoy 1 de enero de 2020, todos los mexicanos radicados en el extranjero tendrán que pagar más por la emisión de pasaportes, matrículas consulares y declaratorias de nacionalidad. Informó la ORG: Dirección General de Servicios Consulares que a partir de esta fecha, todos los servicios que ofrecen los LOC: Consulados de México en el exterior tendrán costos más altos. Las nuevas tarifas marcan un costo de 30 dólares para la matrícula consular. Hasta la víspera costaba 27 dólares; el pasaporte por un año y casos de protección consular, 34 dólares; pasaporte por 3 años, 78 dólares y por 6 años 107 dólares. La declaratoria de nacionalidad tendrá un costo de 17 dólares, esto es dos dólares más que en 2019. Y los connacionales que hagan un testamento público abierto en una oficina consular en el extranjero pagarán un 50% del de MISC: Derechos para el ejercicio 2020, que se publicó en el MISC: Diario Oficial de la Federación el 9 de diciembre de 2019, las cuotas de los derechos en dólares estadounidenses por la prestación de servicios comprendidos en la MISC: Ley Federal de Derechos, se modificaran este 2020
text2:
Bajas ventas reportan vendedores ambulantes del mercadito de la PER: Abraham LOC: González - Impacto
CAMARGO.- En el mercadito de la colonia LOC: Abraham González los vendedores ambulantes han reportado bajas en las ventas de manera considerable, según el líder de la zona exterior, PER: Manuel Ramos.

Dio a conocer que sin duda en el 2019 hubo muchas mejoras por parte del alcalde PER: Arturo Zubia Fernández, sin embargo, las personas no están acudiendo a realizar sus compras como en el pasado.

Informó que previo a la navidad se esperaba un repunte, sin embargo, acudió un 40% menos cantidad de gente.

“Quizás son muchos factores, entre ellos el frio. La gente no va a comprar como antes. Sin embargo, estamos mejorando gracias al alcalde”, informó.

text1: LOC: DPRK presents LOC: Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of MISC: Revolution DPLOC: ##RK presents LOC: Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of MISC: Revolution DPLOC: ##RK presents LOC: Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of MISC: Revolution DPLOC: ##RK presents LOC: Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of MISC: Revolution DPORG: ##RK presents LOC: Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of MISC: Revolution Pyongyang, Dec 31 (ORG: Prensa Latina) The chairman of the ORG: State Committee of Korea, PER: Kim Jong Un, presented LOC: Cuba with flowers on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the MISC: Revolution. The brotherly gesture by the top MISC: Korean leader was also made on behalf of the ORG: Workers ' Party of Korea (ORG: WPK) and the entire people of the LOC: Democratic People ' s Republic of Korea (LOC: DPORG: ##RK), the ORG: Korean Central News Agency (ORG: KCNA) reported. The source added that the action also took place on MISC: New Year ' s Eve, when both countries commemorate the 60th anniversary of relations between LOC: Havana and LOC: Pyongyang. In 2020ted the first anniversary of MISC: Cuban President PER: Miguel Diaz - Canel's visit to the LOC: DPORG: ##RK. According to ORG: KCNA, PER: Kim Jong Un sent the flower basket to the ORG: Cuban Embassy in LOC: Pyongyang. jg/jcm/bj
text2: LOC: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its MISC: Revolution LOC: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its MISC: Revolution LOC: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its MISC: Revolution LOC: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its MISC: Revolution LOC: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its MISC: Revolution 31 MISC: de diciembre de 2019, 11:59HavanMISC: ##a, Dec 31 (ORG: Prensa Latina) Governments and peoples worldwide have congratulated LOC: Cuba on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the triumph of the MISC: Revolution, the ORG: Ministry of Foreign Affairs informed on Tuesday.
